statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption > 100;
SELECT region_id, region_name, energy_type FROM energy_consumption WHERE region_name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT region_name, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY region_name;
SELECT region_name, energy_type, consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption > 100 ORDER BY region_name DESC
SELECT region_name, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY region_name HAVING total_consumption > 500 ORDER BY total_consumption DESC
SELECT region_name, energy_type, ROUND(consumption, 2) AS rounded_consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_type = 'Electricity' ORDER BY rounded_consumption ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE region_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT region_name, energy_type, consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE region_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY region_name
SELECT * FROM Region;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM Region ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT year, AVG(monthly_consumption) AS avg_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY year;
SELECT region_name, year, monthly_consumption FROM Region R JOIN EnergyConsumption E ON R.region_id = E.region_id WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT region_id, year, SUM(monthly_consumption) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE region_id = 1 GROUP BY region_id, year ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT * FROM Region
SELECT region_name, year, monthly_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT region_id, region_name, SUM(monthly_consumption) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY region_id
SELECT region_name, year, monthly_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020 ORDER BY region_name ASC, year DESC
SELECT region_name, MAX(monthly_consumption) AS max_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY region_name
SELECT region_id, region_name, energy_consumption FROM energy_consumption_in_regions;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_in_regions WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT region_id, region_name, energy_consumption FROM energy_consumption_in_regions ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT region_name, total_population FROM region_information WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT month_name, energy_consumption FROM energy_consumption_by_month WHERE month_id = 3;
SELECT region_name, energy_consumption FROM energy_consumption_in_regions WHERE energy_consumption > 1000 ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT region_name, energy_consumption FROM energy_consumption_in_regions WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT region_name, SUM(energy_consumption) AS total_energy_consumption FROM energy_consumption_in_regions GROUP BY region_name;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_by_month INNER JOIN region_information ON energy_consumption_by_month.region_id = region_information.region_id WHERE month_name = 'January';
SELECT region_name, country, total_population FROM region_information WHERE total_population BETWEEN 1000000 AND 5000000 ORDER BY total_population DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_regions;
SELECT region_id, region_name, country FROM energy_consumption_regions WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT source_name FROM energy_sources WHERE source_id = 3;
SELECT region_name, energy_consumption FROM energy_consumption_regions ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE consumption_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_regions;
SELECT region_name, country FROM energy_consumption_regions WHERE energy_consumption >= 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM energy_consumption_regions ORDER BY region_id DESC;

SELECT region_name AS region, consumption_amount AS consumption FROM energy_consumption_regions JOIN energy_consumption_data ON energy_consumption_regions.region_id = energy_consumption_data.region_id WHERE consumption_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_regions, SUM(energy_consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption_regions;
SELECT * FROM Region ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM Region WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT consumption_id, consumption_amount FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Household WHERE region_id = 2 ORDER BY household_id ASC;
SELECT household_id, household_name FROM Household WHERE household_id BETWEEN 3 AND 6;
SELECT * FROM Region ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT region_name, consumption_amount FROM Region JOIN EnergyConsumption ON Region.region_id = EnergyConsumption.region_id WHERE consumption_amount > 1000;
SELECT household_name, production_amount FROM Household JOIN EnergyProduction ON Household.region_id = EnergyProduction.region_id WHERE production_amount < 5000;
SELECT Region.region_name, EnergySource.source_name FROM Region, EnergySource WHERE Region.region_id = 1 AND EnergySource.source_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption JOIN Region ON EnergyConsumption.region_id = Region.region_id ORDER BY consumption_amount ASC;
